001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003/**
004 * This interface specifies methods for retrieving XYZ coordinates of white
005 * point and RGB primaries from the implementing color space.
006 * 
007 * @author WB
008 * @version 2022/11/15
009 */
010public interface RgbPrimaries {
011        
012        // methods required by all implementations of ColorSpace:
013        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value);
014        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value);
015        public float[] toRGB(float[] value);
016        public float[] fromRGB(float[] value);
017        
018        /**
019         * Returns the XYZ coordinates of the white point
020         * associated with this color space (typically D65 or D50).
021         * 
022         * @return the white point
023         */
024        public float[] getWhitePoint();
025        
026        /**
027         * Returns the XYZ color coordinates for the primary color with the specified
028         * index, measured relative to the white point of this color space (see
029         * {@link #getWhitePoint()}).
030         * 
031         * @param idx the color index (R = 0, G = 1, B = 2)
032         * @return the XYZ coordinate for the primary color
033         */
034        public default float[] getPrimary(int idx) {
035                float[] rgb = new float[3];
036                rgb[idx] = 1;
037                return this.toCIEXYZ(rgb);
038        }
039        
040}
